gate.learning

Class EvaluationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.EvaluationConfiguration

  • public class EvaluationConfiguration
extends Object
    Store the spefications of evaluation method and the details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EvaluationConfiguration

        public EvaluationConfiguration()
        Creates an EvaluationConfiguration with the default values *

      • EvaluationConfiguration

        public EvaluationConfiguration(int kk)
        Uses K-fold cross validation.

      • EvaluationConfiguration

        public EvaluationConfiguration(double ratio,
                       int kk)
        Hold-out evaluation. Ratio has a value between 0 and 1 and indicates the ratio of instances to be used for training. A typical value is 0.66. kk is the number of runs for the random selection.

      • EvaluationConfiguration

        public EvaluationConfiguration(double ratio)
        Constructor just using the ratio.
